q: LONDON( AFP)- Prime Minister David Cameron has been damaged by his media chief's resignation over phone-hacking at a tabloid newspaper he headed and the row is unlikely to go away, commentators said Saturday. So far, our worst day in government, a senior aide from David Cameron 's Downing Street office told The Guardian, after Andy Coulson quit as chief of communications on Friday. When I read that interview, my blood ran cold. A more perfect expression of totalitarianism could scarcely be articulated. 's Azure cloud unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. CEO Mike Zafirovski articulates the company assets but says it was overly complex to make decisions and assign accountability. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools.
